thread.title: Bruce: Final hot and muggy day for a while!
thread.title_full: Bruce: Final hot and muggy day for a while! - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Bruce Katz
title: Bruce: Final hot and muggy day for a while!
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - Today will be the final day for the warm and muggy air. As a cold front moves through, we may see a few isolated frontal showers. The cold front will push through late tonight and tomorrow, but the coolest air will lag behind until Thursday.
Thursday's highs will reach the low 80s with Friday through Monday highs in the upper 70s. Overnight lows in the upper 40s to lower 50s north and upper 50s to near 60 south.
Enjoy the beautiful fall weather as we wrap up the week, head into the weekend, and start next week!!
Follow me on Twitter: @BruceKatzFOX8
- Meteorologist Bruce Katz
